title: MVC
content: MVC stands for Model-View-Controller and is a method of building a functional website and database.

title: Handlebars
content: Handlebars.js is a great tool to use with the MVC method, Handlebars.js can be used to create and render different html pages

title: MySQL
content: MYSQl has been around for a long time and is one of the most trusted options for creating a functional database.

title: Web Development
content: A growing industry that provides endless opportunities for creativity, innovation, and problem solving. There is always something new to learn when it comes to web devlopment, the learning never stops!
